alert.note: Alert for Surry; Yadkin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 3:16PM EST until January 10 at 5:17PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Blacksburg VA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina... Yadkin River At Wilkesboro affecting Wilkes County. ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in North Carolina... Yadkin River At Elkin affecting Surry and Yadkin Counties. For the Yadkin River...including Wilkesboro, Elkin...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yadkin River at Elkin. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 18.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 16.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:00 PM EST Tuesday was 18.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 21.5 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 330 AM EST.
